subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Alfred F. Kelly Jr., a former president of American Express, was chosen by the owners of the Jets and the Giants to run the host committee for the 2014 Super Bowl at New Meadowlands Stadium.
snippet: Alfred F. Kelly Jr., a former president of American Express, was chosen by the owners of the Jets and the Giants to run the host committee for the 2014 Super Bowl at New Meadowlands Stadium.
